title: Worlds 2015 to be held in Europe

replies.body: Thank God it's not going to start at 2am every day!

It should be held in Romania, you know... Cluj-Napoca became the European Youth Capital, it would be really apropriate, the UNTOLD FESTIVAL is beeing held here too, so LCS would be even better. NOTICE ME RITO
It will probably be in a first world country.
LOL
Wut? Is it a joke? In romania?
Must be a joke.
Romania would be great! Hype for visiting Count Dracula's Castle :D
YES!

It said in the article that it is too early to share exact details.

It said in the article that it is too early to share exact details.

Well Europe is not country....

Paris
Belgium! Home of Krepo and Duvel !
and Sjokz too

NA Will be probably be 2017. 2016 will likely be China. Hopefully when they do NA they include Canada in there as well.
I hope they bring it to Toronto, that'd be amazing fun.
I will try to be the prophet. Wembley Final HYPE ;)
:D Yay! I might be able to go this year!

I've got a feeling this year will be one of the biggest for eSports yet. The hype for the teams is insane with the roster changes, the drama with the newly anointed Koreans. And now Worlds in Europe. I'd love to see the viewer numbers climb even higher in the US and see more sponsors get into this. Cannot wait for this to start!
I think you're totally right. By the time Worlds next comes to the USA, I think we're going to see more concurrent viewership than the superbowl. These trends are too real to deny :D

Well they're giving some tips where it's going to be this year at post like 
> It’s the setting for the EU LCS, the host for many memorable esports tournaments and events, (including our inaugural World Championship in 2011, IEM, Dreamhack, and last year’s All Star tournament)

Most likely some games are going to be in [Jönköping](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/J%C3%B6nk%C3%B6ping) where DreamHack is. In europe we got quite many good places for big game events like this one.

Of course I hope some games to be held  in Finland at [Helsinki Exhibition and Convention Centre](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helsinki_Exhibition_and_Convention_Centre) where Assembly Demo party is hold also.

Well if some games are going to be in Jönköping I hope I can go there to watch.
They will definitely visit Katowice- Spodek Arena. There where countless events, IEM and so on... I would be  surprised if they would not opt to go to Poland.

I hope there will be in 4 different city at 4 different country...

2 for Group Stages
1 for Quarter Final
1 for Semifinal and Final

alt: each Group in Group Stages have their own city... (dunno how many Group will be there)
Great! Now I have a reason to study abroad in Europe!
Stockholm or riot
Be in NA next year. If it's in LA I'm going everyday.
we did vegas 2 yrs ago how about Eastern US? for those too poor to afford transpertation 3k miles .   ;P
Chances are, its going to be in Koln(Cologne), Germany. Its a pretty central city, as well as the location for EU finals in 2014.

For the love of god, please let it be in The Netherlands.
